title: maakula srI ramaNA
sahitya:
mAkula bhUshaNa shrI ramaNA
Agama pUraNa shrIman nArAyaNa
(nigamAgama) (vEdAgama) mAkula

anupallavi

OmkAraprada sunAda sammOhana
sangItAmrutamu shraviyampa jEsina

caraNam

tatvamasyAdi siddhAntula nirmala
citamunElina bhaktAnukUla
satya swarUpuDai sthiramuga velayu
nitya kalyANa vasanta vaibhavapriya
